llm_res.rule: transferFrom: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.

To prevent attack vectors like the one described here and discussed here, clients SHOULD make sure to create user interfaces in such a way that they set the allowance first to 0 before setting it to another value for the same spender. THOUGH The contract itself shouldn’t enforce it, to allow backwards compatibility with contracts deployed before.
Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
